pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, September 24, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will participate in a briefing on COVID-19 with the Chief Public Health Officer of Canada, Dr. Theresa Tam.                                              

The Prime Minister will participate in a High-Level Roundtable on Climate Action during the United Nations General Assembly. The virtual event will be livestreamed from 11:30 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. at http://webtv.un.org/.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of Jamaica, Andrew Holness.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver a statement in the House of Commons on the death of the Right Honourable John N. Turner.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.
